title: Ride 40 Miles, Get 40% Off LOOK Pedals in This MapMyRide Challenge
content:
Need new road pedals or a power meter? LOOK Cycle is offering a massive spring discount, making it the perfect time to upgrade to their biomotion-illuminated Keo Blade Vision pedals.

Read the full article at Ride 40 Miles, Get 40% Off LOOK Pedals in This MapMyRide Challenge on Velo.
author: Josh Ross
